Html: Why ISimpleIoc interface does not contain something as basic as GetInstance(Of T) method for getting registered instance?

Historically, the idea of most IOC containers was that people would use the ServiceLocator to get access to instances. But I agree with you, these days people are coming away a bit of the CommonServiceLocator pattern and many don't mind using ISimpleIoc all over. I will add the Get methods to it in a future version. Thanks for the feedback.
